subject: 12-150 operator opinions?
author: ourobouros2k2
full_text:
My wife is starting to look at me funny when I pull up 
radioshack.com 'cause she knows what's coming.

I have seen where Steve reports that this mod is pretty difficult 
(getting to the mute wire) and, like him, I love a good challenge. I 
was wondering though, if anyone has used this modded radio regularly 
and can give opinions on it's performance stacked up against a 12-469 -
470 or 20-125. Looks like a more robust design, and that tuner knob 
looks like a great candidate for manual tuning as well. Any thoughts?

Andy
